title: Jedi Knight

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Check to see if someone is a Sith Lord.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you visit a Sith Lord, you will attack them.
- If you are visited by a Sith Lord, they will be attacked. If they are a Sith Master, you will die as well.
- Once all Sith Lords are dead, You will either become a random visiting Town Killing with a single charge.
- Guaranteed if a member of the Sith faction is rolled. And up to 3 can spawn per match.
- You always know of how many Sith lords of each sub alignment remain due to the ways of the Force.

desc:
Post 614
*"For over a thousand generations, the Jedi Knights were the guardians of peace and justice in the Old Republic."*
